benchmark_details.name: CARBD-Ko (A Contextually Annotated Review Benchmark Dataset for Aspect-Based Sentiment Classification in Korean)
benchmark_details.overview: CARBD-Ko is a benchmark dataset designed for aspect-based sentiment classification in Korean, incorporating aspects and dual-tagged polarities to improve sentiment classification accuracy.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve aspect-based sentiment classification (ABSC) models by providing a dataset with dual-tagged aspect polarities.

data.source: Comments collected from users across various domains, including movies and shopping.
data.size: 10,586 instances for training, nearly 3,000 for validation
data.annotation: Manual annotation by a team of annotators assigning aspect-agnostic polarity, aspect polarity, and intensity of aspect polarity.

methodology.calculation: The accuracy for predicting aspect polarity and aspect-agnostic polarity is calculated using performance evaluation metrics relevant to sentiment analysis.
methodology.interpretation: Performance is measured by predicting the sentiment of aspects and their contextual relevance.
methodology.validation: The model's performance was evaluated against pre-existing sentiment classification benchmarks.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data obtained from publicly available sources with personally identifiable information removed.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Available for research purposes only, adhering to ethical guidelines.
